function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of qualified staff for swabbing and processing test samples","Impact":"Slower testing process, higher risk of infection, and strains healthcare staff","Mitigation":"Training and recruitment of additional staff, use of automated swabbing and testing processes","Technologies":"Automated swabbing systems, robot-assisted swabbing, automated laboratory testing","People":"Healthcare workers, testing facility staff","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health ministries"},{"Description":"Inability to identify silent infections without symptoms","Impact":"Failure to detect and isolate carriers, leading to further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of antibody testing, use of blood tests for antibody appearance","Technologies":"Automated blood drawing systems, antibody testing technology","People":"Testing facility staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health ministries"},{"Description":"Risk of exposure for medical staff during blood drawing","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for medical staff","Mitigation":"Use of automated blood drawing systems, reducing manual blood drawing tasks for staff","Technologies":"Robotic systems for venepuncture, automated blood drawing","People":"Medical staff","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate sample transfer and delivery of medicines","Impact":"Delays in testing and treatment, difficulty in reaching infected patients","Mitigation":"Use of autonomous drones or ground vehicles for sample transfer and medicine delivery","Technologies":"Autonomous drones, ground vehicles for medical transport","People":"Infected patients, healthcare workers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health ministries"}]}
